name: 毛紹綱
objective:
1.傳輸線理論
2.微波網路分析
3.阻抗轉換與匹配
4.微波諧振器
5.功率分配與方向藕合器
6.微波濾波器
schedule:
課程綱要：
week    topic
1. Review of EM and Transmission Line Theories	
2. Parallel-Plate Waveguides and Dielectric Waveguides	
3. Microwave Network Analysis	
4. Planar Guided-Wave Structures	
5. Filters	
6. Characteristics of Planar Antenna Design	
7. Final Report and Discussion
materials:
1. 自編講義
2. D. M. Pozar, Microwave Engineering, 2nd ed., John Wiley & Sons, 1998.
3. Robert S. Elliott, An introduction to guided waves and microwave circuits, Prentice-Hall International, 1993.
4. related papers and reports.
